page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Birtley's employment pattern is fairly typical of Gateshead. One third of the population is employed in manufacturing industries. Over 43% of these are men. Over 7O% of all working women are employed in the catering retail distribution trades, such as shops. There is a slightly below average number of men working in the construction industries. 2O men work in agrciculture and 16O in Energy and Water and 22O work in the Transport industry. Unemployment is still a problem in Birtley and will only be solved with government help. The council hope that some large company will take over empty factory buildings and create new jobs.
